title: Video-Based Simulation-Enhanced Knowledge Co-Construction Process for Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic mathematics pedagogy and three or more years of teaching experience
context.additional_context: Conducted on a smartphone-based LMS, aiming to enhance teaching competencies for current practitioners through peer feedback and simulation videos

learning_goals: Analyze video simulations to identify at least three learner engagement strategies for math lesson design.
Propose at least one improvement plan for teaching-learning processes through collaboration with peers and supervisors.
Derive at least two improvement points from their own teaching practices through reflective journaling.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
